data.message: Em gotta stop going on these hiatus , bro. MMLP2 was 4 yrs ago and before that recovery Was 3. I know you the best but cmon man.

replies.message: If you look at his history he averages an album every 2-3 years. Shady XV came out a year after MMLP2. He's been featured in a handful of stuff and came out with a single sense then.

I know bout the features and all that. But none of those compare to when he makes albums and that's what I'm alluding to... And in regards to the albums. His best work slim shady LP, marshal Mather's, and Eminem show came within 3 yrs. So no he usually don't take this long. Only took awhile after encore because of the drugs and other problems.
